Title: Sic Mundus Creatus Est
Writer: Baran bo Odar (created by), Jantje Friese (created by), Jantje Friese, Ronny Schalk
Actors: Lydia Makrides, Deborah Kaufmann, Peter Benedict, Oliver Masucci
Plot: Ulrich looks to the past for answers and dredges up disturbing family secrets. Armed with new tools, Jonas probes the cave's murky depths.
